name: Hydrate Shampoo for Dry, Frizzy Hair
about: What it is:A shampoo that cleanses, moisturizes, and softens hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Cleanses dry, frizzy hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants and provides moistures..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Now with a new and improved formula and fragrance, Verb Hydrate Shampoo gently cleanses and adds moisture to dry, frizzy hair. Powered by argan oil, babassu oil, a moisture-locking ceramide, and a hydrating complex, this shampoo is formulated to leave hair nourished..Fragrance Description:Amber and warm jasmine..Clinical Results:In a test using the full Verb Hydrate Collection in a third-party testing lab, results showed:.- Reduces frizz by 77% after just 1 use
ingredients: -Argan Oil: Rich in antioxidants and provides moistures..-Babassu Oil: Locks in moisture. .-Moisture-Locking Ceramide: Smooths hair, promotes shine, and increases hair elasticity...Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamide MIPA, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Glycol Distearate, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Squalane, Lauryl/Myristyl Polyricinoleate, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycerin, Polyquaternium-7, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Salicylate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Massage into wet hair..-Lather..-Rinse well. .-Follow with Verb Hydrate Conditioner or Verb Hydrate Mask (each sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is color treated and naturally wavy and very course.   I changed nothing about my morning hair styling and I have the softest hair, period.  Now I will say it suds less than most and soap up your palms first then apply.

This shampoo lathered up so nicely that I feel it really aided in the cleansing process and left my hair feeling super clean. The smell is fantastic, my boyfriend even asked me what I used after our whole bathroom smelled like this shampoo. Received this for free in exchange for my honest review, but will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo worked incredibly hair.I got a deep clean and my hair was so hydrated I could tell a difference almost right away. You don't need much product to get a very rich lather. My hair doesn't feel stripped after the shampoo I get more of a balanced clean that I highly recommend.
